title: The Story about Ping (K)
creator_credit: Marjorie Flack, Morton Schindel and Weston Woods Studios
brief_description: An animated film for children adapted from the book written by Marjorie Flack and illustrated by Kurt Wiese, about Ping, a little duckling, who wanders off from his family in search of adventure.
creator_credit_for_label: Marjorie Flack, Morton Schindel and Weston Woods Studios
